mapper.select: SELECT song_style.style_name as name ,count(song_list.style_ids) as "count" from song_style,song_list WHERE song_style.id = song_list.style_ids GROUP BY song_list.style_ids ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT song_list.id as id ,song_list.pic as pic,song_list.title as title,song_list.love as love from song_style,song_list WHERE song_style.id = song_list.style_ids
and song_style.style_name like concat('%',#{style_name},'%')
ORDER BY song_list.id
